tool_description: Simple, real-time access to any property listing in the United States - including home details, active listings, price & rental estimates, and much more
name: Simplified Property Data
title: Simplified Property Data

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Returns a list of properties based on the search criteria.

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description:
Minimum price of the listing

if `status` is `ForRent` this is the minimum monthly rent payment.

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum price of the listing

if `status` is `ForRent` this is the maximum monthly rent payment.

optional_parameters.name: has_pool
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `false`

Whether to only show properties that have a pool

optional_parameters.name: newconstruction
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `true`

Determines if properties that are new construction should be returned
does nothing if `status` isn't `ForSale`

optional_parameters.name: has_ac
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `false`

Whether to only show properties that have air conditioning

optional_parameters.name: salebyagent
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `true`

If properties sold by an agent should be returned
does nothing if `status` isn't `ForSale`

optional_parameters.name: waterfront
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `false`

Whether to only show properties that waterfront

optional_parameters.name: exclude55plus
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `false`

If true, communities for people aged 55+ will not be returned.

optional_parameters.name: comingsoon
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `true`

Shows properties that will be entering the market soon.
does nothing if `status` isn't `ForSale`

optional_parameters.name: singlestory
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `false`

Show only single story properties

optional_parameters.name: days
optional_parameters.description:
Days the property has been listed If `status` is `ForRent` or `ForSale`. 
If status is `RecentlySold`, then it is how many days ago it was sold

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description:
Comma separated list of views from property

Possible values:
* city
* park
* water
* mountain

optional_parameters.name: saleauction
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `true`

Determines if auctions should be returned
does nothing if `status` isn't `ForSale`

optional_parameters.name: salebyowner
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `true`

Determines if properties sold by owner should be returned
does nothing if `status` isn't `ForSale`

optional_parameters.name: foreclosure
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `true`

Whether to show propertiers in foreclosure or not
does nothing if `status` isn't `ForSale`

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Comma separated list of housing types to return.

Possible values:

if `status` is `ForSale` or `RecentlySold`
* houses
* townhouses
* apartments
* condos
* multifamily
* manufactured
* lots

if `status` is `ForRent`:
* apartments_condos_coops
* houses
* townhouses

api_list.name: Property Lookup
api_list.description: Gets detailed information about a property listing
